sentence: In fact, the Arizona group that was integral in bringing the complaint also has had its fingers in similar cases brought against Reps. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., and Marjorie Taylor Green, R-Ga. Other critics of the Democrat movement have said there would need to be an adjudication of someone being involved specifically as an "insurrectionist" before such claims would be legitimate.
author: Bob Unruh
title: Judge rules on Dems' attempt to banish Republican candidates
